Posts.Content: worriedmom wrote: I saw my dr today and he thinks everything he feels is normal and that the lump is either a cyst or maybe a fibroadenoma, but benign, because it's so movable. He's still sending me for an ultrasound and to see a breast specialist, but he kept trying to assure me that he was confident that everything was okay.  a little reassured, but you keep hearing of these stories where the doctors were so surprised that something that seemed benign turned out to be cancer, and I just can't really relax.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: when can I stop worrying? worriedmom CUGymGirl
